amendment.description: Amendment adds consideration of unfunded mandates to the Commission's review of rules.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 1 printed in Part B of House Report 114-388 to add consideration of unfunded mandates to the Commission's review of rules.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Foxx.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
